quotes.quote: Marriage is really tough because you have to deal with feelings ... and lawyers.
Before you marry a person you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
Marriage is a wonderful invention: then again, so is the bicycle repair kit.
Marriage is like a phone call in the night: first the ring, and then you wake up.
Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not.
A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
All marriages are happy. It's the living together afterward that causes all the trouble.
Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
There is nothing in the world like the devotion of a married woman. It is a thing no married man knows anything about.
Before marriage, a man declares that he would lay down his life to serve you; after marriage, he won't even lay down his newspaper to talk to you.
I'm going to get married again because I'm more mature now, and I need some kitchen stuff.
Always get married in the morning. That way if it doesn't work out, you haven't wasted the whole day.
Marriage is like a game of chess, except the board is flowing water, the pieces are made of smoke and no move you make will have any effect on the outcome.
By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
My wife and I tried to breakfast together, but we had to stop or our marriage would have been wrecked.
They say love is blind...and marriage is an institution. Well, I'm not ready for an institution for the blind just yet.

Marriage: A legal or religious ceremony by which two persons of the opposite sex solemnly agree to harass and spy on each other for ninety-nine years, or until death do them join.
The only mistake for which people are congratulated is marriage.
When you see a married couple walking down the street, the one that's a few steps ahead is the one that's mad.
Love is one long sweet dream and marriage is the alarm clock!
Marriage is an adventure, like going to war.
More marriages might survive if the partners realized that sometimes the better comes after the worse.
Marriage is when a man looses his bachelors degree and woman gets her masters degree.
To keep your marriage brimming, with love in the loving cup, whenever you're wrong, admit it; whenever you're right, shut up.
Before I got married I had six theories about raising children; now, I have six children and no theories.
Marriage is like a deck of cards. All you need in the beginning is two hearts and a diamond. After 10 years you need a club and spade.
The husband who wants a happy marriage should learn to keep his mouth shut and his checkbook open.
Marriage: sometimes soulmates, sometimes cellmates.
Marriage is getting to have a sleep over with your best friend, every single night of the week.
Marriage is the bond between a person who never remembers anniversaries and another who never forgets them.
Marriage is a workshop where the husband works and the wife shops.
All my friends are getting married. I guess I'm just at that age where people give up.
Marriage is a relationship in which one person is always right and the other is the husband!
I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.

My husband and I married for better or worse!! He couldn't have done better and I couldn't have done worse!
Getting married is like trading the adoration of many for the sarcasm of one.
The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
Marriage is give and take. You'd better give it to her or she'll take it anyway.
Getting married is a lot like getting into a tub of hot water. After you get used to it, it ain't so hot.
Marriages are made in heaven. But so again, are thunder and lightning.
In Hollywood a marriage is a success if it outlasts milk.
Marriage is popular because it combines the maximum of temptation with the maximum of opportunity.
The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret.
Marriage is a wonderful institution... but who wants to live in an institution?
They dream in courtship, but in wedlock wake.
Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they’re too old to do it.
Marriage – a book of which the first chapter is written in poetry and the remaining chapters in prose.
You know there is a name for people who are always wrong about everything all the time… Husband!
An ideal wife is any woman who has an ideal husband.
For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.
The trouble with some women is that they get all excited about nothing – and then marry him.
What’s the best way to have your husband to remember your anniversary? Get married on his birthday.

Love is a lot like a backache; It doesn’t show up on X-Rays, but you know it’s there.
I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
In olden times, sacrifices were made at the altar, a practice which is still very much practiced.
My wife dresses to kill, she cooks the same way.
We always hold hands. If I let go, she shops.
Marriage must incessantly contend with a monster that devours everything: familiarity.
Any intelligent woman who reads the marriage contract, and then goes into it, deserves all the consequences.

Husbands and wives are so irritating. But without them, who would we blame for misplacing our socks?

Marriage is not just spiritual communion and passionate embraces; Marriage is also three-meals-a-day and remembering to carry the trash out.
Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should just live next door and visit now and then.
Marriage is like vitamins: We supplement each other’s minimum daily requirements.
If love is the answer, could you rephrase the question.
When you have a baby, love is automatic, when you get married, love is earned.
Before marriage, a girl has to make love to a man to hold him. After marriage, she has to hold him to make love to him.
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
If you love ’em in the morning with their eyes full of crust; If you love ’em at night with their hair full of rollers, chances are, you’re in love.
When a man brings his wife flowers for no reason, there’s a reason.
Whatever you look like, marry a man your own age; As your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
When a man opens the car door for his wife, it’s either a new car or a new wife.
When you’re in love, it’s the most glorious two-and-a-half days of your life.
I think men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage – they’ve experienced pain and bought jewelry.

If you want your wife to listen to you, then talk to another woman; she will be all ears.
A kiss without a mustache is like an egg without salt.
She is the only evidence of God I have seen, with the exception of the mysterious force that removes one sock from the dryer every time I do my laundry.
Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl.
A guy knows he’s in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
A good marriage is one where each partner secretly suspects they got the better deal.
Some mornings I wake up grouchy. Other mornings I just let him sleep.
Don’t make love by the garden gate, love is blind but the neighbors ain’t.
Marriage is like a walk in the park… Jurassic Park.
The most important four words for a successful marriage: I’ll do the dishes.
My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
